title: Make New Pool Party Skins Soon!
body:
Its summer now and I'd like to see new pool party skins this year. All I ask for are Pool Party Ahri {{champion:103}}  and Pool Party Irelia {{champion:39}} , since she is now popular it would be a good time to give her a new skin.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=961975&d=1399649703
http://i.imgur.com/koxV6od.jpg

replies.body:
Rito PLEASE
http://img15.deviantart.net/835d/i/2014/192/8/b/pool_party_urgot_by_svillegas-d7q9p47.jpg
http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/SadGnarRitoPlzW_Money_zps31knpetm.jpg

Virginity Guardian Urgot
Braum of the bayWatchers
Nerf Toy Lucian

> [{quoted}](name=Nostormo,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kThOxJAb,comment-id=00190002,timestamp=2016-06-12T10:55:31.566+0000)
>
> Nerf Toy Lucian

Not that accurate.
We need Pool Party {{champion:420}}
Someone had the idea of her tentacles being palm trees. Genius.
Well, not really. Palm trees are flexible but not THAT flexible (they only bow to hurricane force winds) I think pool noodles would be the tentacles
But think, Palm trees just waving peacefully in a breeze, then the next moment they are trying to cave in someones skull
Or we could just make the tentacles pink.
boooooo cop out boooooo
IDK, them palm trees would have to be awfully thick to match the visual. It'd be awkward to make them thin with that massive AoE.

while palm trees might match lee sin in his recall, i like the idea others have put out of pool noodles, even if they are pink. i do think changing the texture/shape to fit the theme is important rather than just a color change.
example!!! for zac, adding the minute details like the speedo and rubber duckies to his pasisve blobs was helpful to the theme of the skin
I liked pool noodles better
I've heard some rumors about a pool party Yorick
Isn't that just normal azir?
I don't get it.
I am making the assumption that the ghosts would be made of sand which would make him just like azir: summoning sand soldiers to attack people.
Oh. I love you. Thank you.

My Pool Party skin wants
{{champion:15}} LifeGuard
{{champion:222}} The first Pool Party had teasers for her even being a champ
{{champion:40}} She just really needs a new skin
{{champion:133}} Valor as a Tropical Bird sounds cool
{{champion:420}} Palm Trees of Death
{{champion:143}} Tropical Flowers theme
can't wait for the Bikini Cho'gath
{{champion:421}} Gurgles with pleasure...
{{champion:163}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:143}} would all be great candidates for Pool Party skins!
...How?
Zyra I can see with Tropical Flowers
I can also see {{champion:163}} sitting on a rock while at the beach, but i can't really imagine a fiddlesticks pool party skin. Maybe a Halloween skin.
Noodlesticks. Enough said.
taliyah would be a surfer, I don't know about the others though

The problem with Ahri getting a pool party skin is most people just want her in a bikini. That's it. Now how would that define her character? Not at all, she would just become some hot girl in a two piece with tails. Now if they did something unique with it, kind of like what they did with Leona. Not make her too revealing but still making sure the fan boys/girls get their eye candy, that would be nice.

She could easily be a synchronized swimmer with some fancy animations for her ult. I personally would love to see her in a one-piece with a big fancy sun hat and a beach ball.

Also, what's wrong with eye-candy? Why can't we have a bikini Ahri? Why is it and less valid an idea than any other skin idea? Just because it would show some skin it's automatically a bad idea? You can have a character in a revealing outfit and still do something cool with it. _**They did it with Pool Party Graves**_, why can't they do it with Ahri (or any of Leagues other fine ladies for that matter)? There is absolutely nothing wrong with eye candy...

Beach balls.

Beach balls everywhere.
wouldn't that be more suited to {{champion:134}}

They both can have Beach Balls.

They can have shared splash arts where they're a beach volleyball duo.

Done.

$$$$$$
What she really needs is a lifejacket bigger than she is. Thered be even more backlash than dynamic q

they already have a style for Ahri, look at the background of the original pool party skins. it's a purple one piece with the sides and back removed

[left side here](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Ziggs_3.jpg)

> they already have a style for Ahri, look at the background of the original pool party skins. it's a purple one piece with the sides and back removed

Can we please take this time to appreciate the fact that everyone in those Pool Party splash arts are actually hanging out together in a pool without trying to slaughter one another?
i know, it's like the beach is a place that's off limits to all fighting
Ahri and Irelia? My 2 mains? I like you, my man.

Also Syndra

http://pre10.deviantart.net/faf2/th/pre/i/2014/338/4/d/pool_party_syndra_by_generic_jane-d88ofnq.png
Pool Party Urgot coming out right after star gaurdian Urgot.
http://img15.deviantart.net/835d/i/2014/192/8/b/pool_party_urgot_by_svillegas-d7q9p47.jpg
I approve this idea ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Other ideas:

-Pool Party Wukong (With a pool noodle)
-Pool Party Vlad (Snorkeler)
-Pool Party Thresh (If he didn't just get a skin) (Life preserver as a lantern)
-Pool Party Soraka (with one of those safety hooks on a pole)

> -Pool Party Thresh (If he didn't just get a skin) (Life preserver as a lantern)

> (Life preserver as a lantern)

What makes this idea so great is that fact that no one ever grabs the lantern, so in this scenario, Thresh's teammate is going to drown. XD

pool party sion. make eet happen rito {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:14}}
He could be a shark and they play the jaws music when he ults.

> [{quoted}](name=bill84,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kThOxJAb,comment-id=00170000,timestamp=2016-06-12T00:51:59.545+0000)
>
> He could be a shark and they play the jaws music when he ults.

I was thinking his ult was a jetski and the flame aura would be water, his W could be him wearing one of those waist-floatation thingies that pops
Pool Party Rek'sai's ult is a jetski.
He just had his legendary, so I dun think he'll get one this year sadly.
I want itty bitty bikini miss fortune
Irelia is thick...xD
